item.description:
Yooki Yama in Branford is highly recommended by Anne, who describes it as a "small place" which to me means it is a GREAT place...one of the "little gems." I read some reviews, and they also very glowing! Unfortunately, they are not open on Sundays. Anne has agreed to be the "event host" for this, since I can not be there. I hope some of you can go and check it out. It might also be a great chance for some of you who have difficulties with Sunday nights.

I think it is unique that they use japanese pear in some rolls...at least I have not seen that much, and this beef roll sounds interesting: KOREAN SESAMEBBQ beef, pickled radish, spinach, egg, cucumber.

Check out the menu:
http://www.yookiyama....

Some reviews:
http://www.yelp.com/b...
http://www.tripadviso...

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday (yes you read it right) at Yooki Yama.
